text:
You can set the "schema/external-schemaLocation" and "schema/external-
noNamespaceSchemaLocation" in the org.apache.xerces.framework.XMLParser class 
but if you try get the contents via a getProperty call a 
SAXNotRecognizedException will be thrown.
creator: martin.boettcher@greenbytes.de

text: getProperty was fixed in CVS on June 25.
creator: elena@apache.org
